title: Tom Brady and Gisele Bündchen Divorce After 13 Years of Marriage
description: The closely watched celebrity couple announced their split on Instagram and filed their divorce agreement in a Florida court.
dc:creator: Jesus Jiménez and Kevin Draper
media:description: Gisele Bündchen and Tom Brady after the Super Bowl in February 2021, which Brady won with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
